claim.text: A battery backup sump pump costs $500 to $1,500 installed
claim.claim: Battery backup sump pump installation costs $500 to $1,500

results.summary: The $500-$1,500 range for battery backup sump pump installation aligns with typical pricing from home improvement sources.
results.detail: Battery backup sump pump systems typically cost $200-$600 for the unit itself, with professional installation adding $200-$500+ in labor. The total installed cost of $500-$1,500 is consistent with pricing commonly cited by HomeAdvisor, Angi, and similar home improvement cost guides. The wide range accounts for variations in pump quality, battery capacity, and installation complexity.
sources: General knowledge of home improvement cost databases (HomeAdvisor, Angi, Fixr) - unable to verify with live web search due to permission restrictions
